data.enText: a special activity or purpose of a person or thing
to fulfil/perform a function
bodily functions (= for example eating, sex, using the toilet)

data.chText: 心脏的功能就是把血液输往全身。
data.enText: The function of the heart is to pump blood through the body.

data.chText: 这个设计旨在使形式和功能协调一致。
data.enText: This design aims for harmony of form and function.
a social event or official ceremony

data.chText: 大厅给婚礼和其他社会活动提供了场所。
data.enText: The hall provided a venue for weddings and other functions.
a quantity whose value depends on the varying values of others. In the statement 2x=y, y is a function of x.

data.chText: 工资视乎年龄和经验而定。
data.enText: Salary is a function of age and experience.
a part of a program, etc. that performs a basic operation
to work in the correct way

data.chText: 尽管供电中断，医院继续照常运作。
data.enText: Despite the power cuts, the hospital continued to function normally.

data.chText: 现在我们有一个功能正常的淋浴器。
data.enText: We now have a functioning shower.

data.chText: 许多孩子在大班上课时学习效果不好。
data.enText: Many children can't function effectively in large classes.
function as sb/sth
to perform the action or the job of the thing or person mentioned
The sofa also functions as a bed.

simple_means.memory_skill: funct 活动 + ion 表名词 → 功能

ex.chText: 员工没有义务购买本公司生产的产品。
ex.enText: Employees are under no obligation to buy any products from their own company.

ex.chText: 他们不得不履行条约规定的义务。
ex.enText: They have to fulfil the obligations imposed on them by the treaties.

ex.chText: 他出于责任感而替她保守秘密。
ex.enText: He kept the secret for her out of a sense of obligation.

ex.chText: 事实上，履行这些义务需要更多的财力。
ex.enText: In fact, greater resources are needed to meet these obligations.

synonyms.bx: 指法规、合同等规定的该做或不该做的事，含强制之意；也指因诺言、誓言等而必须要做的事。

ex.chText: 该公司对质量作出承诺。
ex.enText: The company made a commitment to quality.

ex.chText: 88%的受访者表示婚姻应该是一辈子的承诺。
ex.enText: 88 percent of respondents said marriage should be a lifelong commit-ment.

ex.chText: 她作出了多项承诺。
ex.enText: She's got a lot of commitments.

synonyms.bx: 指会去做某事的保证或保证去做的事情。

ex.chText: 他觉得帮助邻居是他的责任。
ex.enText: He feels it is his duty to help his neighbors.

ex.chText: 她从小就被教育要有强烈的道德责任感。
ex.enText: She was brought up to have a strong sense of moral duty.

ex.chText: 切勿忘记你对祖国应尽的义务。
ex.enText: Never forget your duty to your motherland.

ex.chText: 他的职责包括清理草坪。
ex.enText: His duties included sweeping the lawn.

synonyms.bx: 指在道义或法律上应尽的本分，强调自觉性；也指工作职责，此时通常用复数。

ex.chText: 你准备好在新的工作岗位上履行职责了吗？
ex.enText: Are you ready to perform your functions in your new job?

ex.chText: 这个新成立的部门的职能是什么？
ex.enText: What's the function of this newly founded department?

synonyms.bx: 指某人的工作职责或某事物的职能或功用。

ex.chText: 一般而言，升职意味着更多的薪水和更大的责任。
ex.enText: Generally speaking, a promotion means higher salary and more responsibility.

ex.chText: 如有任何变动，你有责任通知他们。
ex.enText: It's your responsibility to inform them of any changes.

ex.chText: 谁应该为这场政治危机负全责？
ex.enText: Who should accept full responsibility for the political crisis?

ex.chText: 她的职责包括分发宣传册和接听电话。
ex.enText: Her responsibilities include handing out brochures and answering the phone.

synonyms.bx: 指管控某人或某事物的责任、对不良事件所负的责任或工作职责，强调对他人的责任。

ex.chText: 他教我如何使用计算机。
ex.enText: He taught me how to operate a computer.

ex.chText: 机器运转正常。
ex.enText: The machine operates well.

synonyms.bx: 指人操控机器或设备，也指机器等运行。

ex.chText: 供水系统有点问题。
ex.enText: The water system is not functioning well.

ex.chText: 尽管供电中断，医院继续照常运作。
ex.enText: Despite the power outage, the hospital continued to function normally.

ex.chText: 他早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。
ex.enText: He can't function without a coffee in the morning.

synonyms.bx: 指系统、机器设备、机构、人等正常工作。

ex.chText: 她没法让空调工作起来。
ex.enText: She couldn't get the air conditioner going.

ex.chText: 我的表不走了。
ex.enText: My watch isn't going.

synonyms.bx: 指机器、装置等工作，多用于口语。

ex.chText: 他的货车用的是柴油。
ex.enText: His van runs on diesel.

ex.chText: 别让发动机熄火。
ex.enText: Keep the engine running.

ex.chText: 这个软件在任何电脑上都能运行吗？
ex.enText: Will the software run on any computer?

synonyms.bx: 指机器、引擎等工作或使其开动，也指计算机程序运行或使其运行。

ex.chText: 链锯坏了。
ex.enText: The chainsaw doesn't work.

ex.chText: 钟走得很正常。
ex.enText: The clock is working properly.

ex.chText: 那个小男孩甚至连录像机都会用。
ex.enText: That little boy can even work the video.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指机器或设备正常工作，也可指使用机器或设备。

data.enText: function as sb/sth
to perform the action or the job of the thing or person mentioned
The sofa also functions as a bed.

tr: the actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group
example: the function of a teacher
the government must do its part
play its role
the function of an auger is to bore holes
ballet is beautiful but what use is it?

tr: a set sequence of steps, part of larger computer program

example: the party was quite an affair
an occasion arranged to honor the president
a seemingly endless round of social functions

tr: a formal or official social gathering or ceremony
example: it was a black-tie function

tr: a relation such that one thing is dependent on another
example: height is a function of age
price is a function of supply and demand

tr: (mathematics) a mathematical relation such that each element of a given set (the domain of the function) is associated with an element of another set (the range of the function)
perform duties attached to a particular office or place or function
example: His wife officiated as his private secretary
The washing machine won't go unless it's plugged in
Does this old car still run well?
This old radio doesn't work anymore

tr: serve a purpose, role, or function
example: The tree stump serves as a table
The female students served as a control group
This table would serve very well
His freedom served him well
The table functions as a desk

value.def: The function of something or someone is the useful thing that they do or are intended to do.

example.ex: The main function of the merchant banks is to raise capital for industry.
example.tran: 商业银行的主要职能是为产业融资。

value.def: If a machine or system is functioning, it is working or operating.

example.ex: The authorities say the prison is now functioning normally...
example.tran: 当局称监狱现在运转正常。

example.ex: Conservation programs cannot function without local support.
example.tran: 没有地方的支持，自然环境保护项目就无法运作。

value.def: If someone or something functions as a particular thing, they do the work or fulfil the purpose of that thing.

example.ex: On weekdays, one third of the room functions as workspace.
example.tran: 在工作日，房间的1/3用作办公区域。

value.tran: 发挥功能;起作用;行使职责

value.def: A function is a series of operations that a computer performs, for example when a single key or a combination of keys is pressed.
value.tran: (计算机的)功能(指执行的一系列操作)

value.def: If you say that one thing is a function of another, you mean that its amount or nature depends on the other thing.

example.ex: Investment is a function of the interest rate.
example.tran: 投资随着利率的变化而变。

value.tran: 应变量;随他物变化而变化的事物

value.def: A function is a large formal dinner or party.

trans: 系统函数；系统功能；系統功能；系统功能语句；开放系统功能
服务功能；业务保护功能模块；服务函数；菜单；服务职能
肝功；肝功能；肝功能检查；肝功能试验；肝脏功能
生產函數；生产函数；用生产函数；出产函数；生产功能

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 否定 + funct 活动 → 不活动的 → 死亡的
dys 坏 + function 功能 → 机能失调
funct 活动 + ion 表名词 → 功能
funct 活动，作用 + ion 表名词 + al …的，具有…性质的 → 能运转的；实用的
per 坏 + funct 活动 + ory …的 → 活动〔因此〕搞砸了 → 草率的
